showDialogDescription.message: If this field is checked, Formlet will be displayed in context menu as a group and you will be able to change some Formlet options in context menu.

saveBlankDescription.message: If this field is checked, then Formlet saves also empty fields. This means that while restoring form - fields saved as empty will be cleared.

saveHiddenDescription.message: If this field is checked, then Formlet saves also hidden fields.

savePasswordsDescription.message: Check this field to store passwords. CAUTION: it's not recommended to store password using this extension. Formlet does not encrypt stored data, which can be easily read by unwanted person.

saveFormIdDescription.message: By default Formlet saves form ID or path and allows to restore data only in form with exactly the same ID or path. When this option is unchecked, Formlet saves form without ID and allows to run bookmarklet on any active (focused) form (but form fields names still have to match).

titlePatternDescription.message: Set your own bookmarks title pattern. You may use following symbols, which will be dynamically replaced: {TITLE} - will be replaced by page title; {DATE} - will be replaced by current date.

bookmarksFolderDescription.message: Folder to store your saved forms (bookmarklets). Click to change it.
